qu1: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt.
qu2: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
qu3: Love is a game that two can play and both can win.
qu4: I love her, and it is the beginning of everything.
qu5: A true relationship is two imperfect people refusing to give up on each other.
qu6: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
qu7: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
qu8: The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
qu9: Once I knew you I never wanted to know anyone else.
qu10: You deserve someone who is terrified to lose you.
qu11: Far too many people are looking for the right person, instead of trying to be the right person.
qu12: We don’t meet people by accident. They are meant to cross our path for a reason.
qu13: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
qu14: A good relationship is when someone accepts your past, supports your present, and encourages your future.
qu15: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
qu16: To the world, you may be one person, but to one person you are the world.
qu17: I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.
qu18: Promise me you'll never forget me, because if I thought you would, I'd never leave.
qu19: Love is something eternal; the aspect might change, but not the essence.
qu20: I got lost in him, and it was the kind of lost that's exactly like being found.
qu21: There is my heart, and then there is you, and I’m not sure there is a difference.
qu22: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.
qu23: All relationships have one law. Never make the one you love feel alone, especially when you’re there.
qu24: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
qu25: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
qu26: If love cannot stand the test of time, then it has failed the test of love.
qu27: When your absence is felt, your presence is the essence and it makes a difference.
qu28: She affected me, even when she was absent.
qu29: I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart).
qu30: We are so different, yet so much the same.
qu31: The simple lack of her is more to me than others’ presence.
qu32: I exist in two places, here and where you are.
qu33: In true love the smallest distance is too great and the greatest distance can be bridged
qu34: I want to be with you. It’s as simple and as complicated as that.
qu35: I’m not telling you it is going to be easy- I am telling you it is going to be worth it.
qu36: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
qu37: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love in the years we were apart.
qu38: My heart is your home, wherever in the world you are – you will always have a place to stay.
qu39: In many ways, the art of love is largely the art of persistence.
qu40: Love is not finding someone to live with. It’s finding someone you can’t live without.
qu41: Love will travel as far as you let it. It has no limits.
qu42: Distance is just a test of how far love can travel.
qu43: The scariest thing about distance is you don’t know if they’ll miss you or forget about you.
qu44: Distance means so little when someone means so much.
qu45: Maybe if you can't get somebody out of your head, they're supposed to be there.
qu46: One day I caught myself smiling for no reason, then I realized I was thinking of you.
qu47: I smile to the sky when I think of you.
qu48: If I quit thinking of you, I might stop breathing too.
qu49: We loved with a love that was more than love.
qu50: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
qu51: You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
qu52: You are the source of my joy, the centre of my world and the whole of my heart.
qu53: The only thing I’ve ever desired is to be a part of your life.
qu55: Not just in this lifetime, but I’ll pick you each and every time I will in this world
qu56: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own
qu57: Let’s flip a coin. Heads, I’m yours. Tails, you’re mine.
qu58: What I have with you, I don’t want with anyone else.
qu59: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.
qu60: my six-word love story: I can’t imagine life without you.
qu61: I may be miles away from you, but always remember that I am forever by your side.
qu62: My love for you is a journey. Starting at forever, ending at never.
qu63: Loved you yesterday, love you still, always have, always will.
qu64: Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive.
qu65: I need you like a heart needs a beat.
qu66: If you are lucky enough to find a weirdo, never let them go.
qu67: I am my beloved’s and my beloved is mine.
qu68: They say when you meet the love of your life, time stops, and that’s true.
qu69: I crown you the Queen of my heart
qu70: No one will ever know how perfect you are to me.
qu71: I will walk with you and follow you till the end.
qu72: No one else matters when I look into your eyes.
qu73: You are the winner and the sole owner of my heart.
qu74: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
qu75: Love is shown more in deeds than in words.
qu76: All that you are is all that I’ll ever need.
qu77: I think I'd miss you even if we never met.
qu78: Everything I do, I do it for you.
qu79: True love stories never have endings.
qu80: Love is something sent from heaven to worry the hell out of you.
qu81: And in her smile I see something more beautiful than the stars.
qu82: Love is a song that never ends.
qu83: Two souls with but a single thought. Two hearts that beat as one.
qu84: You are the best decision my heart ever made.
qu85: You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I’ve ever had.
qu86: When I look into your eyes I see the mirror of my soul.
qu87: I know I am in love with you because my reality is finally better than my dreams.
qu88: When it’s real, you can’t walk away.
qu89: I’m not going far. I’ll always be here. Just an inch away. I promise.
qu90: It’s always better when we’re together.
qu91: I discovered true happiness the day you walked into my life.
qu93: In short, I will part with anything for you, but you.
qu94: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
qu95: We are the perfect couple, we’re just not in the perfect situation.
qu96: When something is missing in your life, it usually turns out to be someone.
qu97: Love isn’t something you find. Love is something that finds you.
qu98: Being apart teaches us how to be together.
qu99: Where you are is where I want to be.
qu100: Three words. Eight letters. Say it, and I'm yours.
